closed_reason: Implemented stop hook with branch-aware filtering and auto-sync on in_progress
design: Use Claude Code stop hook to check for ready issues (via 'mb ready') when agent stops. If similar issues exist, block the stop and provide the agent with guidance to continue working on the next issue.
notes: Based on Claude Code hooks documentation. Stop hook receives transcript_path and can return {decision: block, reason: ...} to prevent stopping.
title: Add stop hook to continue with ready issues
